|brand = Radxa |model = Rock Pi 4 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = A |revision = (1GB) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2020/12/29 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/radxa/radxa_rock_pi_4 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3399; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_cores2 = 4 |cpu1_total_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |cpu1spd2 = 1.4 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = XTX Tech;XT25F32BWOIG; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HCNNN4KUML-HRNME; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.09;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.154;Ubuntu 20.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, Mini PCIe (NGFF M.2), Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module socket, HDMI 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9-20 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Type-C
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, via GPIO header,, (1500000 8N1),, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module socket, HDMI 2.0, MIPI DSI, Audio 3.5mm out, MIPI CSI, RTC, SPI, I2C, I2S, SPDIF, ADC, GPIO, |addchip = Power Management IC w/ RTC;Rockchip;RK808-D;;1;,,, Low Power Audio CODEC;Everest Semiconductor;ES8316;;1;,,, USB Type-C PD2.0 Controller;Shenzhen Legendary Tech;LDR6015T;;1;,,, Fixed 5V 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ 100mA LDO;MPS;NB679;;1;,,, 16V 3A 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1495S;;1;,,, 5.5V 6A 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR837;;1;,,, 5.5V 6A 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR838;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8089;;1;,,, 1A 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8088;;1;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bi-directional Level Shifter;Diodes Inc;PI4ULS5V104;;1;,,, 100mΩ Power Distribution Switch;SG Micro;SGM2576;;1;,,, 300mA CMOS LDO Regulator;LP Semi;LP3983S;;1;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;6; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = rock |defaultpass = rock |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 9TV, Android 10, Armbian, LibreELEC, Manjaro ARM, DietPi, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2018 |estprice = 39 |upc = 4038816107060 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Radxa|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3399 Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) @1.8GHz :+ Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.4GHz *GPU: ''Mali-T864'' (OpenGL ES3.1, OpenVG 1.1, OpenCL, DX11) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) LPDDR4 *Storage: 4MB SPI Flash, eMMC socket :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 3.0 (OTG), 2x USB 2.0 ports *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: USB Type-C (supporting USB PD 2.0) :and Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0
==Links of Interest== *[http://linuxgizmos.com/rk3399-based-raspberry-pi-clone-will-launch-at-49-or-even-lower/ ''RK3399 Raspberry Pi clone will launch at $39'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/11/08/rock-pi-4-raspberry-pi-rk3399-board/ ''Rock Pi 4 Raspberry Pi Compatible RK3399 Board'' on '''CNX|Software''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/radxa/radxa_rock_pi_4 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = rockchip |subtarget = armv8 |arch = aarch64_generic |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = Wifi 5GHz, Bluetooth |comment = 1, 2, 4, 8GB versions available. eMMC modules from 8-128GB }} Please insert instructions here
